Now the white Bishop is unprotected. If the White take on c3 I will regain material with tempo with Qxd3+. The only solution for White is to take away the white Bishop to b5, continuing to control d3.
A definite blunder. What follow was a disaster.
The white Knight is completely useless and the pressure on c and e files is literally crushing White's pieces. He must defend the immediate Qxe2#.
